casebody.data:
Ronnie Edward MOORE
v.
Priscilla Ann MCKENZIE individually, and Priscilla Ann McKenzie, as Executor of the Estate of Bobby Jenkins Byrd No. 343P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Robert A. Buzzard, Lillington, Jason Phillip Kimble, Attorneys at Law, for Moore, Ronnie Edward Cecil Bo Jones, Attorney at Law, Dunn, for McKenzie, Priscilla Ann (Ind. & Executor), et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of October 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
